Pickles the Study instance to a file

static from_epoched_file(fname_template, file_id, epoching=None, mode='oom')¶

Load and epoch data from a file

Parameters
epochingint | dict | None

If int, uniformally epoch the data; if iterable, epoch the data over the (start, end) time pairs returned by the iterable; if string, load the timings from a file; if None, load the file as one recording

classmethod from_file(fname_template, file_id, cropping=(0.0, None), mode='oom')¶

filename: str
mode: str
gen_fractal(self, n_moments=2, freq_band=(0.01, 2))¶

Compute fractal values for all the signals in the recording

Parameters
n_momentsint

Number of moments of the Daubechies wavelet used in the transform

freq_band(int, int)

Frequency band over which to fit the linear regression

gen_multifractal(self, j1=1, j2=10, normalization=1, gamint=0.0, weighted=True, wt_name='db3', p_exp=None, q=None, n_cumul=3)¶
